# NSToolbar.DisplayMode.default

**Case**

The default display mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Display modes

- **NSToolbar.DisplayMode.iconAndLabel**: The toolbar displays an icon and label for each item.
- **NSToolbar.DisplayMode.iconOnly**: The toolbar displays only an icon for each item.
- **NSToolbar.DisplayMode.labelOnly**: The toolbar displays only a label for each item.

items.description: The toolbar displays an icon and label for each item.
items.name: NSToolbar.DisplayMode.iconAndLabel

items.description: The toolbar displays only an icon for each item.
items.name: NSToolbar.DisplayMode.iconOnly
